title: 12g Slow Drawdown Minimal Pour
preparation_steps: Add coffee to V60 and tare scale

brewing_steps.instruction: Pour 36g water for bloom. Minimal agitation.
brewing_steps.audio_script: Start timer. Pour 36 grams for the bloom. Be gentle—minimal agitation is the goal here.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Vierte 36g de agua para bloom. Agitación mínima.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Inicia el cronómetro. Vierte 36 gramos para el bloom. Sé suave—la agitación mínima es el objetivo aquí.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Pour smoothly to reach 130 grams by 1 minute and 5 seconds. Keep the stream low and steady.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Vierte suavemente para alcanzar 130 gramos a 1 minuto 5 segundos. Mantén el flujo bajo y constante.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Pour the rest to reach 200 grams by 1 minute 25 seconds. Avoid turbulence.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Vierte el resto para alcanzar 200 gramos a 1 minuto 25 segundos. Evita turbulencia.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Let it draw down naturally. By minimizing agitation, we keep the fines from clogging the paper, leading to a smooth finish.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Deja que drene naturalmente. Al minimizar la agitación, evitamos que los finos tapen el papel, logrando un acabado suave.

what_to_expect.description: This method relies on minimal agitation to prevent fine migration and clogging, which is crucial for maintaining flow rate in small doses without using a coarse grind.
what_to_expect.audio_script: Turbulence is the enemy of small doses. This recipe uses a gentle hand and minimal agitation to keep the bed structured, preventing clogging and ensuring a clean, consistent brew.
what_to_expect.description_es: La molienda fina extiende el tiempo de contacto para máxima dulzura. El drenaje lento de 4 minutos produce una taza con cuerpo y sabores desarrollados.
what_to_expect.audio_script_es: Usamos molienda fina para extender el tiempo de contacto a 4 minutos. Este drenaje lento maximiza la dulzura y produce una taza con cuerpo completo.

notes: Use a gooseneck kettle for precise control. The key is keeping everything as smooth as possible to avoid turbulence, which causes clogging with small doses.
notes_es: Molienda fina para extender el tiempo de contacto y maximizar la dulzura.
preparation_steps_es: Muele 12g de café a molienda fina.
